title: Goodyear Wash And Wax Hydrophobic Polymer 2.5 Ltr | Leaves A Glossy Just Waxed Deep Protective Shine | Polymer-acrylic Polyethylene Copolymer Wax | Effectively Cleans Dirt And Grime From Your Vehicle
availability_text: Only 10 left in stock (more on the way).
features: Advanced Hydrophobic Polymer Formulation: The Goodyear Wash & Wax is expertly crafted with a cutting-edge hydrophobic polymer formulation that delivers superior water-beading action. This innovative technology creates a protective barrier on your vehicle’s surface, causing water to bead up and roll off effortlessly.

Deep Glossy Shine with Just-Waxed Look: Achieve a showroom-worthy finish with the Goodyear Wash & Wax. Infused with a polymer-acrylic polyethylene copolymer wax, this product leaves your car with a deep, glossy shine that resembles a freshly waxed surface.

Effective Dirt and Grime Removal: Designed to be tough on dirt yet gentle on your vehicle’s finish, this wash and wax solution effectively removes stubborn dirt, grime, road film, and other contaminants. Its powerful cleaning agents penetrate and lift away residues, leaving your car’s paintwork looking clean and vibrant.

The Goodyear Wash & Wax doesn’t just clean; it also deposits a durable protective wax layer that shields your vehicle’s paint from environmental hazards. The hydrophobic wax forms a defensive layer against UV rays, road salt, bird droppings, and other pollutants, helping to preserve your car’s paintwork and maintain its luster over time.

Versatile and Economical: With a generous 2.5 Ltr size, the Goodyear Wash & Wax offers excellent value for money, providing numerous washes for cars, trucks, SUVs, and motorcycles. It’s suitable for use on all exterior surfaces, including paint, glass, chrome, and plastic trim, making it an all-in-one solution for vehicle maintenance.
description: Experience the ultimate in car care with Goodyear Wash and Wax Hydrophobic Polymer, a 2.5 LTR solution that combines superior cleaning power with advanced protection. This high-performance formula is designed to deliver a deep, glossy shine that resembles a just-waxed finish, all while safeguarding your vehicle’s exterior with a lasting protective layer. The secret behind the Goodyear Wash and Wax lies in its unique hydrophobic polymer formulation. This advanced technology creates a water-repellent surface on your vehicle, causing water to bead and roll off effortlessly. This not only keeps your car looking cleaner for longer but also helps prevent water spots and streaks, making it easier to maintain that showroom shine. In addition to its hydrophobic properties, the Goodyear Wash and Wax contains a premium blend of polymer-acrylic polyethylene copolymer wax. This powerful combination works to effectively lift and remove dirt, grime, and road contaminants from your vehicle's surface, all while imparting a durable, protective wax layer that enhances your car's natural luster. Simply mix with water, apply to your vehicle's exterior, and rinse off for a streak-free finish. The formula is designed to be tough on dirt yet gentle on your vehicle's paintwork, making it suitable for all types of finishes, including clear coats. Not only does Goodyear Wash and Wax leave your car looking freshly detailed, but it also provides long-lasting protection against environmental elements. Whether you're dealing with rain, dust, or UV rays, this product ensures your vehicle remains protected, preserving its appearance and value.
